com.samsung.android.sdk.pen.recognition

Class SpenRecognitionBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.samsung.android.sdk.pen.recognition.SpenRecognitionBase
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SpenEquationRecognition, SpenShapeRecognition, SpenTextRecognition

    public abstract class SpenRecognitionBase
extends Object
    This class provides the basic Pen recognition methods.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  SpenRecognitionBase.ResultListener
      This listener interface provides callback methods for receiving recognition results when you call request(List).

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void request(List<SpenObjectBase> input)
      Request a recognition result.
      void setResultListener(SpenRecognitionBase.ResultListener listener)
      Set the specified SpenRecognitionBase.ResultListener instance to receive recognition result events.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • request

        public void request(List<SpenObjectBase> input)
             throws Exception
        Request a recognition result.
        The response to this method is returned asynchronously. Register your SpenRecognitionBase.ResultListener instance to receive the results.
        Parameters:
        input - Object with the input data for the recognition engine
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - Thrown if the recognition engine is not loaded.
        Exception - Thrown if the recognition engine returns an error.
        See Also:
        setResultListener(ResultListener)

      • setResultListener

        public void setResultListener(SpenRecognitionBase.ResultListener listener)
                       throws Exception
        Set the specified SpenRecognitionBase.ResultListener instance to receive recognition result events.
        Register the listener first before calling request(List).
        Parameters:
        listener - The SpenRecognitionBase.ResultListener instance to receive recognition result events.
        Throws:
        Exception - Thrown if the recognition engine returns an error.
        See Also:
        request(List), SpenRecognitionBase.ResultListener
